com.customlbs.library

Class IndoorsFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.library.IndoorsFactory

  • public final class IndoorsFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Gives you the indoo.rs public interface.

    Ensures there are not multiple instances of Indoors.

    See Also:
    getInstance(), createInstance(Context, String, IndoorsServiceCallback), releaseInstance(IndoorsServiceCallback)

    • Method Detail

      • createInstance

        public static void createInstance(android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String licenseKey,
                  IndoorsServiceCallback serviceCallback)

        Create an indoors instance.

        Call this method in your Activity#onCreate() or Activity#onStart.

        Only one license key per application is allowed. If different keys are provided within one application the behavior is undefined. Throws IllegalStateException or SecurityException if the AndroidManifest.xml definition is wrong.

        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        licenseKey - the developer license key
        serviceCallback - callback to receive IndoorsServiceCallback.connected()
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - no service callback or license key provided
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - wrong AndroidManifest definitions
        java.lang.SecurityException - wrong AndroidManifest definitions

      • createInstance

        public static void createInstance(android.content.Context context,
                  java.lang.String licenseKey,
                  IndoorsServiceCallback serviceCallback,
                  boolean debug)

        Create an indoors instance.

        Call this method in your Activity#onCreate() or Activity#onStart.

        Only one license key per application is allowed. If different keys are provided within one application the behavior is undefined. Throws IllegalStateException or SecurityException if the AndroidManifest.xml definition is wrong.

        Parameters:
        context - the application context
        licenseKey - the developer license key
        serviceCallback - callback to receive IndoorsServiceCallback.connected()
        debug - if true, enables ALL logging in indoo.rs service (prints only warnings and errors otherwise)
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - no service callback or license key provided
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - wrong AndroidManifest definitions
        java.lang.SecurityException - wrong AndroidManifest definitions

      • getInstance

        public static Indoors getInstance()

        Get the indoors instance.

        You must first call createInstance(Context, String, IndoorsServiceCallback).

        Returns:
        the indoors instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - instance not created
        See Also:
        createInstance(Context, String, IndoorsServiceCallback)

      • releaseInstance

        public static void releaseInstance(IndoorsServiceCallback serviceCallback)

        Release requested instance and free resources.

        Call this method in your Activity#onDestroy or Activity#onStop with the callback provided in createInstance.

        Parameters:
        serviceCallback -
        See Also:
        createInstance(Context, String, IndoorsServiceCallback), getInstance()
